subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: New Zealand has roundly beaten South Africa and Australia in the Tri-Nations, putting itself in a good position a month from the World Cup -- but the team has been in the same position before, and failed.
snippet: New Zealand has roundly beaten South Africa and Australia in the Tri-Nations, putting itself in a good position a month from the World Cup -- but the team has been in the same position before, and failed.
